entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Edmundston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:57 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmundston 5:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: NNW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16 except minus 20 in low lying areas. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 16 except minus 20 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
